Mechanical Engineer


Passionate about Thermal Engineering

Good fundamental concept about Thermodynamics, principles

Knowledge of Steam Turbines, heat exchangers for power plant cycle applications, including surface condensers, oil coolers (shell

and tube type), air coolers, and plate heat exchangers. ORC cycle for waste heat recovery systems

Data Analysis and interpretation of designed v/s actual performance of steam turbines

Evaluation of Train based on lateral and Torsional analysis

Adaptability to work on different tool chain

Using database for data evaluation of heat exchangers


Mechanical Engineer


Learn about steam turbine design principles and their application in real-world projects.

Converting thermal calculations into detailed construction drawings for components such as inner casings, diaphragms, shafts, blades,

and sealing shells.

Gain experience in reverse engineering and translating site measurements into manufacturing drawings to ensure accurate fit and

function.

Contribute to the quality control of documentation and drawings to meet design and construction requirements.

Conduct FEA simulations for static, transient, linear, nonlinear, fatigue, and thermal analyses.

Interpret FEA results and propose design changes to optimize component performance.

Document FE calculations in the form of structural integrity design reports.


Mechanical Engineer


Supervises production activities according to established quality standards and EHS requirements.

Ensures adherence to defined manufacturing guidelines, processes and procedures.

Contributes to production planning processes, and determines manufacturing priorities based on established weekly production

schedules. Makes daily assignments, and assigns work and tasks to the member of the production group.

Interprets specifications and makes judgments about the acceptability of production that is in process.

Proposes procedures improvements and implements technical infrastructure.

Leads and supervises assigned Production Technicians, Operators and workers.


Mechanical Engineer


Good Understanding and knowhow of Manufacturing drawings and Techniques Manpower Handling on Shop floor

Familiarity with digitalization and automation techniques for shop floor
